question: who sings so come and dance with me jai ho
chain_of_thought_result: The song "Jai Ho" is performed by A.R. Rahman, and it features vocals by Sukhwinder Singh, Tanvi Shah, Mahalaxmi Iyer, and others. The phrase "so come and dance with me" is part of the lyrics in the context of the song. "Jai Ho" gained widespread popularity after being featured in the film "Slumdog Millionaire."
